name: Marvel API Connector
description: Fetches data from the Marvel API

properties.label: Character ID
properties.description: A single character ID.

properties.label: Character ID
properties.description: A single character ID.

properties.label: Format
properties.description: Filter by the issue format.

properties.label: Format Type
properties.description: Filter by the issue format type.

properties.label: Exclude Variants?
properties.description: Exclude variant comics from the result set.

properties.label: Predefined Date Range
properties.description: Return comics within a predefined date range.

properties.label: Date Range
properties.description: Return comics within a predefined date range. Dates must be specified as date1,date2 (e.g. 2013-01-01,2013-01-02).

properties.label: Title
properties.description: Return only issues in series whose title matches the input.

properties.label: Title Starts With
properties.description: Return only issues in series whose title starts with the input.

properties.label: Start Year
properties.description: Return only issues in series whose start year matches the input.

properties.label: Issue Number
properties.description: Return only issues in series whose issue number matches the input.

properties.label: Diamond Code
properties.description: Filter by diamond code.

properties.label: Digital ID
properties.description: Filter by digital comic id.

properties.label: UPC
properties.description: Filter by UPC.

properties.label: ISBN
properties.description: Filter by ISBN.

properties.label: EAN
properties.description: Filter by EAN.

properties.label: ISSN
properties.description: Filter by ISSN.

properties.label: Has Digital Issue?
properties.description: Include only results which are available digitally.

properties.label: Modified Since
properties.description: Return only records which have been modified since the specified date (YYYY-MM-DD).

properties.label: Creators
properties.description: Return only records which feature work by the specified creators (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

properties.label: Events
properties.description: Return only records which take place in the specified events (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

properties.label: Series
properties.description: Return only records which are part of the specified series (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

properties.label: Stories
properties.description: Return only records which contain the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
